Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: KingdomVision
Reviews.Content: These cables shipped and were in new condition at a great price compared to what I could get them for locally. The only issue with these cables is that they are extremely long and did not come on a spool, so they can easily get tangled if you do not carefully unwind them.

Reviews.Title: Very thin internal wires.
Reviews.Author: Rame Thomas
Reviews.Content: Used under carport. Pulled wires through conduit. Wires are very weak so don't try to pull them very hard. One would keep losing signal when i stuffed wires in conduit box, when i finally got it working the power wire shorted out and almost melted jacket around plug. I had to cut the jacket off and retape wires and it worked fine after that. I used 3/4 conduit but if I had to do it again I would use 1 inch conduit to ease the stress on pulling wires through.Also don't forget to lube the wires if pulling through conduit. The video feed is pretty clear.

Reviews.Title: Video cables
Reviews.Author: jose araujo
Reviews.Content: I love it because it gave me more length to get the job done.I am installing all this cameras to try to discourage the thief, and let them know we are watching them.

Reviews.Title: Extra cable
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Manuel
Reviews.Content: extra cable helped hook up cameras on the back of the house. Worked well with the syatem we bought through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: NO WEATHER RESTRICTIONS
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel T. Toney
Reviews.Content: I HAVE USED THIS ITEM MANY TIME BEFORE, IT HAS LASTING POWER!THIS ITEM HAS NO RESTRICTIONS, CAN BE USED IN DIFFERENT TEMPS WITHOUT PROBLEMS.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: KERBY MILLER
Reviews.Content: Great product for the money!!!  I ordered these so I could have the ability to see what was going on in my yard and garage.

Reviews.Title: very long
Reviews.Author: RAMON GABRIEL JR
Reviews.Content: good quality cables can be pulled as tight as one wants them and nothing happens to them I put cameras all around my business and the picture is great. thanks

Reviews.Title: excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with a home security system and everything fell into place with all of the professionalism that I love to see.

Reviews.Title: security cam cords
Reviews.Author: tkeels
Reviews.Content: these cords work great for the distance i need to run them i wished i had found these befor i ran the others with extensions

Reviews.Title: BEWARE, You get what you pay for !
Reviews.Author: Don Walls
Reviews.Content: For starters the wire is super fragile and not for out doors, Every day I'm spending countless hous wiggling connecters or replacing as I just finished doing for the third time, I would not recommend this system to anyone

Reviews.Title: Great Cables
Reviews.Author: Jimmie S.
Reviews.Content: These are very nice cables that have the 3rd plug for audio and seem to have good quality connecting ends.  I would recommend and also would purchase again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Unwinding the long cable
Reviews.Author: Armando A. Villa
Reviews.Content: Go outside  and work on a field that is at least 75 feet long without obstructions. Go to one end of the field and with the bundle of cables in your hand separate the ends that have the connectors in a big V, one end to the right (camera) and the other end to the left (VCR). Now walk backwards toward the other end of the field unwinding the bundle in a rolling matter until you get to unwind the whole thing. Make sure that when you are walking backwards, you keep the lines separated. When you arrived at the end of the field, your whole 150 feet will be laid in front of you, now grab one end and get to work on your installation...ask your wife for a recompense ...lol ;)

Reviews.Title: tangled mess
Reviews.Author: J. Cunningham
Reviews.Content: This stuff tangled so bad comming out of the bag it took near an hour to get one untangled, I believe the rest will go in the trash.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 x 150 feet audio video power cables in black
Plug and play ready. Be made of pure copper and of good quality
Transmit audio video signals and supply DC power for CCTV security cameras
Output type: BNC video, RCA audio & 2.1mm power connectors
Low cost miniature cable. For DC power only
